info.name: UnguessApi Latest
info.description:
An API to get all data for your bugfinding and ux research needs!

Contact Support:
 Name: Developers
 Email: it@unguess.io

body.raw:
{
  "title": "<string>",
  "start_date": "<string>",
  "end_date": "<string>",
  "close_date": "<string>",
  "campaign_type_id": "<integer>",
  "project_id": "<integer>",
  "pm_id": "<integer>",
  "platforms": [
    {
      "id": "<integer>",
      "deviceType": "<integer>"
    },
    {
      "id": "<integer>",
      "deviceType": "<integer>"
    }
  ],
  "customer_id": "<integer>",
  "express_slug": "<string>",
  "customer_title": "<string>",
  "status_id": "<integer>",
  "is_public": "<integer>",
  "page_preview_id": "<integer>",
  "page_manual_id": "<integer>",
  "has_bug_form": "<integer>",
  "has_bug_parade": "<integer>",
  "description": "<string>",
  "base_bug_internal_id": "<string>",
  "use_cases": [
    {
      "title": "<string>",
      "description": "<string>",
      "functionality": {
        "title": "<string>",
        "id": "<number>",
        "description": "<string>",
        "content": "<string>",
        "category": {
          "value": "<Error: Too many levels of nesting to fake this schema>"
        },
        "device_type": "<string>",
        "locale": "en",
        "image": "<uri>",
        "requiresLogin": false
      },
      "logged": "<boolean>",
      "link": "<string>"
    },
    {
      "title": "<string>",
      "description": "<string>",
      "functionality": {
        "title": "<string>",
        "id": "<number>",
        "description": "<string>",
        "content": "<string>",
        "category": {
          "value": "<Error: Too many levels of nesting to fake this schema>"
        },
        "device_type": "<string>",
        "locale": "en",
        "image": "<uri>",
        "requiresLogin": false
      },
      "logged": "<boolean>",
      "link": "<string>"
    }
  ]
}
